about_the_game:
Welcome to Isle of Harvest, a charming farming simulation and adventure game set on a lush, mysterious island. As the newest arrival to this remote paradise, you'll build a thriving farm and discover new and exciting crops.

Your journey begins with a rundown plot of land and a heart full of dreams. Transform your surroundings, shape your story in this beautifully handcrafted world.

Key Features:

  • Grow Your Legacy: Cultivate diverse crops to build a flourishing farm.

  • Craft and Customize: Design your dream farm with crafted items, decorations, and upgrades.

  • Relaxing Activities: Enjoy the stunning vistas of the island.

Immerse yourself in a world of endless possibilities where every choice shapes your journey. Whether you're seeking relaxation or adventure, Isle of Harvest offers an experience you won’t forget.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit version 1909 revision .1350 or higher, or versions 2004 and 20H2 revision .789 or higher
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or 12 compatible graphics card with the latest drivers
